methods.name: CreateMusicManager
methods.comment: Create a music manager from the specified class in a config

methods.name: Get
methods.comment: To easy access the music manager from anywhere, can return null if world context is invalid or no music manager is spawned.

methods.name: NotifyPostLoadMap
methods.comment: Notify that a new map has been loaded.

methods.name: OnPlayerEnteredArea
methods.comment: Called whenever a player enters an area

methods.name: Update
methods.comment: called on regular interval to update music

methods.name: OnPostLoadMap
methods.comment: Called when a new level has been loaded.

properties.name: mUpdateInterval
properties.comment: How often (in seconds) we want to check if we are close to a factory

properties.name: mFactoryCloseDistance
properties.comment: The distance that we considers a factory as close

properties.name: mAkObject
properties.comment: Object we post event on, set RTPC on etc.

properties.name: mUpdateHandle
properties.comment: Handle for the timer to check if a player i near a factory

properties.name: mIsPlayerNearBase
properties.comment: If the player is in his factory.
